texts.site-footer-1: The [b]eyeOS Project 2008[/b]. Open Source Web Operating System & Web Office. [a mail]Contact Us[/a]

texts.site-sidebar-community-text: Become part of the eyeOS community around the world!
texts.site-sidebar-donations-text: eyeOS is Open Source, and everybody can help.
texts.site-sidebar-download-text: Get the latest eyeOS and build your own server. eyeOS is Open Source!
texts.site-sidebar-signup-text: If you just want to use eyeOS, you can use the eyeOS Public Server.
texts.site-title: eyeOS | Web Desktop - Web OS - Web Office - your files and applications everywhere!
